title: Crystal bomb

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Crystal bomb is one of the Great Olm's attacks. The olm spits out up to three bombs which land at random locations in the room and blow up after a short delay. If a player is within the blast radius of the bomb when it explodes they will take between 15 and 60 damage, based on the their distance from the centre of the explosion.

The '''Crystal bomb''' is one of the [[Great Olm]]'s attacks. The olm spits out up to three bombs which land at random locations in the room and blow up after a short delay. If a player is within the blast radius of the bomb when it explodes they will take between 15 and 60 damage, based on the their distance from the centre of the explosion.
